summary: In 2008, two best friends stepped into their very first crop circle in southern England. This is story of what happened next.
cast: Colin Andrews|Francine Blake|Tim Carson|Will Carson|Nassim Haramein|Bert Janssen|W.C. Levengood|Rachel Lin|John Martineau|Charles Maxwell|Hugh Newman|Dax Phelan|Nicola Romanski|Peter Sorensen|Andy Thomas
title: A Field Full of Secrets
